trans-unit.source: Represents a collection that contains operation descriptions.
A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is used to describe the contract for a service, including the associated operations.

The operations are accessed from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Operations%2A> property which returns the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection> for the contract.

Each contract operation has a corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply.

Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in turn describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>.
Returns an operation description with a specified name from the collection of operation descriptions.
This method returns the first occurrence of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in the collection with the name specified.

If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> objects in the collection use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> method instead.
The name of the operation.
An <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> with the name specified.
Returns a collection of all the operation descriptions from the collection that have the specified name.
The name of the operation.

The <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> that contains the operation descriptions with the specified name.
name is `null`.
Inserts an element into the operation description collection at the specified index.
This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.
The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to insert.
item is `null`.
Replaces the operation description element in the collection at the specified index.
This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.
The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription"></xref> to set.
item is `null`.
